name.description: The name of the ExpressRoute gateway. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the ExpressRoute gateway. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

virtual_hub_id.description: The ID of a Virtual HUB within which the ExpressRoute gateway should be created.

scale_units.description: The number of scale units with which to provision the ExpressRoute gateway. Each scale unit is equal to 2Gbps, with support for up to 10 scale units (20Gbps).

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The ID of the ExpressRoute gateway.

create.description: Used when creating the ExpressRoute Gateway.

update.description: Used when updating the ExpressRoute Gateway.

read.description: Used when retrieving the ExpressRoute Gateway.

delete.description: Used when deleting the ExpressRoute Gateway.
